30: dialog snowman You! What is your business here? Why are you attacking us?
dialog tux You must be the Snow King!
dialog snowman You are mistaken. I'm not the king of this land, just the lord of this castle.
dialog snowman What business do you have with our king?
dialog tux I'm gonna teach him a lesson with my fins!
dialog snowman What?! You would dare attack the good king? I will not allow this!
